message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this valuable product, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $875000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $825000, but that's as high as I can go. I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand your constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession to try to reach an agreement. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $850000, which is still a good deal considering its value to me. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
